name: CogBool
summary: This object represents a boolean (TRUE or FALSE)

not.summary: Returns FALSE if this boolean is TRUE, otherwise returns TRUE

and.summary: Returns TRUE only if this boolean is TRUE and provided boolean is TRUE

or.summary: Returns TRUE only if this boolean is TRUE or provided boolean is TRUE or both this boolean and provided boolean are TRUE

xor.summary: Returns TRUE only if this boolean is TRUE or provided boolean is TRUE
